nodes.text: I was not aware I had made it a request, child. Kill him!
I can't understand a word you're saying. Perhaps you should see Juan or Vikki about an alignment.
You see AHS-9, the Great and Terrible.
Trust me, child, you are referring to the Enclave.
Good. Let me know when you're done, and I'll begin making inquiries into ways we can achieve your goal at the same time. Farewell, child.
All our needs have been met. Now it is time for me to meditate.
You see AHS-9, the Great and Terrible.
If you'll agree to do me a favor, I can help you, child.
You see AHS-9, the Great and Terrible.
Yes, my child?
You have killed the Emperor and destroyed his minions?
That, my child, you will have to discover on your own. Ask around and you shall find the truth.
Then go and smite those troublesome souls. I await word of your success. [He smiles beatifically.]
Flying ships? You must be referring to the Enclave and their vertibirds.

The Enclave are a remnant of the past - a neurodyne that has yet to be aligned. They have hidden bases all over the shards of old California, and their strongest stronghold is off to the west, over the waters.
Ah, child, how could you stray from the path of truth like this? I see from your aura that you plan to kill me. I am bitterly disappointed. Bitterly. Ah well. Let us proceed.
Too late, meat. You have shown you cannot be trusted. Die!
I was not aware I had made it a request, child. Kill him!
If you change your mind, let me know. Remember, I may be the only way you have of reaching your family.
Of course, child. The alignment has cleared your basic neurodynes and aligned them with mine and the spokes of the Great Wheel. What do you need?
Yes, my child?
A letter from the Enlightened One? Is that what she calls herself now? Bah. [he takes the letter from you] And she promised a reward? You have a reward - my gratitude. Good day.
Your enburgled aura tells me that you come here meaning me no good. Tell me, child, do you wish to profit from your venture?
Ahh, a letter from my field agent. Pity she calls herself "The Enlightened One" - it shows that she truly is not enlightened. You have my gratitude.
You disobey the commands of AHS-9, the Great and Terrible? Then you shall die.
Child, there are some things you are not meant to know for now. [He smiles benignly.]
Remember, you will need to visit AHS-7 when you have completed your task.
Then there is no one who can stand in my way! But I see no need to be beholden to a mere tool. Farewell - and good riddance!
My counterpart, The Emperor of Shi-town, has been making my life miserable. I'd like you to end his. In return, I'll make sure you can get where you need to be.
Seek out Badger, whose caustic presence holds those  pathetic tanker vagrants together. Rid our fair city of him. When you have done so, visit AHS-7.
The ESS Quetzel will launch when the stars are right.
Greetings to you as well. Now, please finish your job so that I may aid you.
You see a well-dressed man.
You are in the presence of AHS-9, the Great and Terrible. What is it you desire of him?
Child, I am AHS-9.  I see many things that transpire in the fleshy world. Do you have more questions, or may I return to my meditations?
You see a well-dressed man.
This, then, is my bargain: return to the Shi and eliminate Ken Lee and the Emperor. I will repay you with more money than you have ever dreamed.
Address your questions to AHS-7. I am AHS-9, the Great and Terrible, and I have many matters on my mind. Trouble me not, meat.
My counterpart, The Emperor of Shi-town, has been making my life miserable. I'd like you to end his. In return, I'll make sure you can get where you need to be.

links.text: Oh, all right. I'll do it.
No.
Anks!
Anks! [It has been a pleasure, AHS-9. I wish you all the best. Good bye.]
Yeah, okay. How do I find them?
D'bye! [So long, AHS-9. You're a great man.]
All right. I have more questions.
Return to your meditations. I'm done.
Oik? [What is it? I'd be happy to be of assistance.]
No!
Yes, I have. Now I require your assistance in helping my people.
When does the spaceship take off?
Do you have any tasks for me?
Where does all the money we provide go?
Oh, nothing. Forget it.
Yes, I have.
Whatever. Bye.
Very helpful. I have more questions.
How do you know all this?
No, wait, I changed my mind. I want you dead.
So long.
Enclave? Enclave who?
Yeah, I guess so.
How do I get there?
How do you know all this?
Yes, let's. Die.
-done-
No.
Oh, all right. I'll do it.
Ok. [What is this favor?]
Didgeroo! [Thanks, I'd rather not owe anyone. So long!]
Aagga diggle doodle doo! [Oh, thank goodness. I'm looking for my people. I need to get over the big water.]
B-b-b-enny [Nothing, thanks. It's just nice being able to talk to you. Bye!]
Hinchoaf? [You can understand me?]
Aagga diggle doodle doo! [Oh, thank goodness. I'm looking for my people. I need to get over the big water.]
Poopy pants! [Well, thanks for your time. I have to be running along now. A pleasure talking to you.]
Err, I had some questions.
Gee, great. Bye.
That's it? Old man, you're dead.
Yes.
No.
No problem. I have a question or two, though.
Great. Bye.
Wait, I changed my mind.
Bring it on.
Hm. Bye.
All right. I have more questions.
Not yet. I'll get back to you.
Oh, AHS-9, I come bearing a letter from your agent in NCR. I bow to your glory.
Unh-uh [Not yet. I just wanted to say hi.]
I'm working on it. I have some questions.
Oh. Well, if that's the way it's got to be. So long.
Why, you scumbag. I'm going to kill you now.
No!
Ays! [I'll do it.]
Sure thing, boss. See ya.
I'd rather not.
Thanks. Bye.
Right-o. I have more questions.
Ng! Ng! [Yes, sir!]
Yes, I have. Now I require your assistance in helping my people.
The Enlightened One in NCR wanted me to deliver a letter. She said something about a reward?
I have many questions for you, AHS-9.
The Enlightened One in NCR wanted me to deliver a letter. Here you go.
Your death. Good bye, old man.
Oh, AHS-9, I come bearing a letter from your agent in NCR. I bow to your glory.
Agh a nu, AHS!
I'm looking for my people. I heard they came down this way in flying ships.
Nothing, sorry.
Return to your meditations. I'm done.
More questions.
Anks! [It has been a pleasure, AHS-9. I wish you all the best. Good bye.]
No, I don't think so.
You've got a deal, fat man.
If you won't answer my questions, you'll answer my weapons.
Whatever.
I'd rather not.
Sure thing, boss. See ya.
